li.a: Support Staff Member of the Year

img.alt: Image that reads Click for updates on the FCSD Response to COVID-19

figcaption.p: Click for updates on the FCSD response to COVID-19

div.div: Download the Free Blackboard District App

Excellence. Preparation for Life.
Opportunities for All.

We are excited to announce that the Fairfield High School graduation is rescheduled for Saturday, August 1, 2020 at 7:00 p.m.! The ceremony will be in the Cintas Center at Xavier University. As with everything during these challenging times, we are keeping our fingers crossed that nothing changes. Stay positive, Class of 2020!

h3.a: 3rd Quarter Report Cards Now on ProgressBook for Grades 1-12

div.div: Parents/Guardians of students in grades 1-12: 3rd quarter report cards are now available on ProgressBook. If you need help logging into ProgressBook, please contact your child's teacher. Third quarter grades for kindergarten students will be mailed.

h3.a: 2020 FCSD Arts Fair Canceled, Virtual Talent Show to be Planned Instead

div.div: Due to our school closure order and the need to continue social distancing, Arts Fair 2020 is now the...FCSD Virtual Talent Show! We are disappointed that the Arts Fair had to be canceled, but we want to make sure our students, staff and families stay healthy. Please click the headline for information on how YOU can get involved in our virtual talent show. For a full description of this first-ever event visit bit.ly/FCSDVirtualTalentShow

img.alt: Information graphic about hand washing. It includes the steps for the process: Wet, Get Soap, Scrub, Rinse, Dry. It also says hands that look clean can still have icky germs!

h3.a: FCSD Schools CLOSED through Friday, May 1, 2020 - Click Here for Additional Information

div.div: Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, the Ohio Department of Health has extended the closure of all schools through Friday, May 1. Read more about updates, meal distribution, building closures, and cancelations. Please check back frequently as information is subject to change. Thank you.
Location: FCSD Administration Building 4641 Bach Lane Fairfield, OH 45014
